proyectos.descrip_p3: Bidirectional telemetry and control system designed to digitize industrial environments. A 5-layer architecture was implemented that transforms field signals (Modbus RTU/RS485) into cloud data, using OPC UA as an interoperability standard and MQTT for scalable propagation. The solution enables real-time supervision and control of actuators from a reactive web interface using WebSocket, eliminating information blind spots in a plant.
